edu.cnm.deepdive.funrun.controller

Class EventController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.funrun.controller.EventController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/events")
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=Event.class)
public class EventController
extends java.lang.Object
    Indicates that Spring Boot controller class Event is able to respond to HTTP requests.
